Package com.advertisementproject.confirmationtokenservice.db.repository

Interface ConfirmationTokenRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ConfirmationToken,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ConfirmationToken,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ConfirmationToken,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ConfirmationToken>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ConfirmationToken,​java.util.UUID>
@Repository
public interface ConfirmationTokenRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ConfirmationToken,​java.util.UUID>
Repository for managing confirmation tokens in the database

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteAllByUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Deletes all confirmation tokens for a specific user id
    java.util.Optional<ConfirmationToken> findByToken​(java.lang.String token)
    Retrieves an optional confirmation token object for a supplied token string
    java.util.List<ConfirmationToken> findConfirmationTokenByConfirmedAtNotNullAndUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Retrieves all confirmation tokens that have been confirmed for a supplied user id.
    void updateConfirmedAt​(java.lang.String token, java.time.LocalDateTime confirmedAt)
    Sets a specific confirmation token to confirmedAt = supplied timestamp (which should be current timestamp)

  • Method Details

    • findByToken

      java.util.Optional<ConfirmationToken> findByToken​(java.lang.String token)
      Retrieves an optional confirmation token object for a supplied token string
      Parameters:
      token - the token string for which to retrieve a confirmation token object
      Returns:
      the confirmation token object matching the supplied token, or an empty optional if there is no match.

    • findConfirmationTokenByConfirmedAtNotNullAndUserId

      java.util.List<ConfirmationToken> findConfirmationTokenByConfirmedAtNotNullAndUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Retrieves all confirmation tokens that have been confirmed for a supplied user id.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to retrieve all confirmed tokens
      Returns:
      list of confirmed tokens for a supplied user id

    • updateConfirmedAt

      @Transactional @Modifying @Query("UPDATE ConfirmationToken c SET c.confirmedAt = ?2 WHERE c.token = ?1") void updateConfirmedAt​(java.lang.String token, java.time.LocalDateTime confirmedAt)
      Sets a specific confirmation token to confirmedAt = supplied timestamp (which should be current timestamp)
      Parameters:
      token - the token to confirm
      confirmedAt - the confirmedAt time to set (should be current timestamp)

    • deleteAllByUserId

      @Transactional void deleteAllByUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Deletes all confirmation tokens for a specific user id
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to delete all confirmation tokens
